Title: Establishes a volunteer firefighters' benefit claim assistance unit to initiate contact with firefighter or surviving dependents and assist with claims
Summary: Establishes a volunteer firefighters' benefit claim assistance unit to initiate contact with an injured firefighter or his or her surviving dependents and assist with filing claims and expediting payments.
LawCode: Amd ยง40, Vol Ffs Ben L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the volunteer firefighters' benefit law, in relation to providing for temporary payments of benefit pending final determination of claim
